greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Numbers k such that lcm(1,2,3,...,k)/13 equals the denominator of the k-th harmonic number H(k).
link: Jinyuan Wang, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..851
mathematica: a = h = 1; t = {}; Do[a = LCM[a, n]; h = h + 1/n; b = a/Denominator[h]; If[b == 13, AppendTo[t, n]], {n, 27408}]; t
results.author: _Robert G. Wilson v_, Sep 17 2005
